hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Qatadah that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:"When any one of you enters the Masjid, let him pray two Rak'ahs before he sits down

chapter.ara-name: باب الأَمْرِ بِالصَّلاَةِ قَبْلَ الْجُلُوسِ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: The Command To Pray Before Sitting Down In It
